product_name: Mountain Hardwear Plasmic Downtown Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: Technology goes undercover in the urban-inspired Plasmic Downtown Rain Jacket for men from Mountain Hardwear. It's a waterproof, breathable jacket in disguise. Dry.Q(TM) EVAP polyester fabric accelerates evaporation for more breathability and comfort, at a light weight. Melange face fabric has a subtly textured look and feel. 2 zippered chest pockets. Exposed center-front zipper is water resistant. Adjustable hood provides extra coverage. Mountain Hardwear Plasmic Downtown Rain Jacket for men feels great next to the skin.
short_description: Technology goes undercover in the urban-inspired Plasmic Downtown Rain Jacket for men from Mountain Hardwear. It's a waterproof, breathable jacket in disguise.
